20110130060019.000|20110130060020.000|CC1|>> THE MORNING OF FEBRUARY 15, I
20110130060020.000|20110130060022.000|CC1|GOT UP EARLY, BROUGHT MY WIFE   
20110130060022.000|20110130060024.000|CC1|COFFEE IN BED, AND THEN WE HAD  
20110130060024.000|20110130060025.000|CC1|OUR VALENTINE'S CELEBRATION.    
20110130060025.000|20110130060026.000|CC1|I GAVE HER A CARD, SHE GAVE ME A
20110130060026.000|20110130060030.000|CC1|CARD.                           
20110130060030.000|20110130060031.000|CC1|>> THE VALENTINE'S DAY WAS      
20110130060031.000|20110130060032.000|CC1|ALWAYS A VERY SPECIAL DAY FOR   
20110130060032.000|20110130060034.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110130060034.000|20110130060035.000|CC1|>> HE PAINTED A PICTURE OF      
20110130060035.000|20110130060035.000|CC1|LOVERS.                         
20110130060035.000|20110130060037.000|CC1|HE TALKED ABOUT HOW SWEET AND   
20110130060037.000|20110130060038.000|CC1|CARING AND TENDER THEY WERE WITH
20110130060038.000|20110130060040.000|CC1|EACH OTHER.                     
20110130060040.000|20110130060042.000|CC1|>> SHE WROTE ME A CARD THAT I   
20110130060042.000|20110130060043.000|CC1|WAS THE MOST IMPORTANT PERSON IN
20110130060043.000|20110130060044.000|CC1|HER LIFE, THAT SHE LOVED ME VERY
20110130060044.000|20110130060045.000|CC1|MUCH, THAT MORNING.             
20110130060045.000|20110130060050.000|CC1|>> AFTER THE BREAKFAST, HE TOLD 
20110130060050.000|20110130060052.000|CC1|US HE WENT TO HIS MOTHER'S HOUSE
20110130060052.000|20110130060053.000|CC1|IN SANDY SPRINGS, GEORGIA, ABOUT
20110130060053.000|20110130060104.000|CC1|35 MILES AWAY.                  
20110130060104.000|20110130060106.000|CC1|>> ALEC SAID WHEN HE ARRIVED    
20110130060106.000|20110130060106.000|CC1|HOME THAT EVENING, HE FOUND THAT
20110130060106.000|20110130060109.000|CC1|ALL THE LIGHTS WERE OFF.        
20110130060109.000|20110130060110.000|CC1|>> I WALKED THROUGH THE HOUSE.  
20110130060110.000|20110130060111.000|CC1|I CALLED OUT HER NAME.          
20110130060111.000|20110130060112.000|CC1|I TURNED THE CORNER AND WENT TO 
20110130060112.000|20110130060113.000|CC1|HER OFFICE, AND I SAW HER ON THE
20110130060113.000|20110130060116.000|CC1|FLOOR.                          
20110130060116.000|20110130060117.000|CC1|I SAW BLOOD UNDER HER ARM, THE  
20110130060117.000|20110130060119.000|CC1|BLOOD ON THE WALL, SO I CALLED  
20110130060119.000|20110130060130.000|CC1|911.                            
20110130060130.000|20110130060131.000|CC1|>> WHEN I WALKED IN, THE FIRST  
20110130060131.000|20110130060133.000|CC1|THING I NOTICED WAS CAST-OFF    
20110130060133.000|20110130060135.000|CC1|BLOOD THAT RAN UP THE WALL.     
20110130060135.000|20110130060136.000|CC1|I NOTICED THAT THERE WAS A LARGE
20110130060136.000|20110130060137.000|CC1|POOL OF BLOOD ON THE FLOOR      
20110130060137.000|20110130060139.000|CC1|AROUND HER BODY.                
20110130060139.000|20110130060141.000|CC1|AND I COULD SEE BLOOD IN HER    
20110130060141.000|20110130060142.000|CC1|CLOTHING, AND I COULD SEE OPEN, 
20110130060142.000|20110130060144.000|CC1|GAPING WOUNDS WHERE SHE HAD BEEN
20110130060144.000|20110130060147.000|CC1|STABBED ON HER TORSO.           
20110130060147.000|20110130060149.000|CC1|>> MY SISTER CALLED ME AND SHE'S
20110130060149.000|20110130060151.000|CC1|FRANTIC, AND SHE BASICALLY SAID 
20110130060151.000|20110130060153.000|CC1|THAT THE COWETA COUNTY POLICE   
20110130060153.000|20110130060155.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT NEEDED ME TO COME    
20110130060155.000|20110130060156.000|CC1|DOWN THAT SOMETHING HAPPENED TO 
20110130060156.000|20110130060157.000|CC1|MOM.                            
20110130060157.000|20110130060158.000|CC1|>> I CALLED MY MOM'S PHONE, NO  
20110130060158.000|20110130060159.000|CC1|ANSWER.                         
20110130060159.000|20110130060201.000|CC1|I CALLED THE HOUSE, NO ANSWER.  
20110130060201.000|20110130060204.000|CC1|I CALLED ALEC, AND HE ANSWERED. 
20110130060204.000|20110130060206.000|CC1|HE WAS CRYING AND I SAID, "ALEC,
20110130060206.000|20110130060208.000|CC1|ALEC, WHAT'S GOING ON?"         
20110130060208.000|20110130060211.000|CC1|>> YOUR MOTHER, YOUR MOTHER.    
20110130060211.000|20110130060212.000|CC1|>> HE'S LIKE, "YOUR MOM, YOUR   
20110130060212.000|20110130060213.000|CC1|MOM..."                         
20110130060213.000|20110130060214.000|CC1|HE COULDN'T FINISH WHAT HE WAS  
20110130060214.000|20110130060215.000|CC1|SAYING.                         
20110130060215.000|20110130060216.000|CC1|>> YOUR MOTHER'S GONE, HONEY.   
20110130060216.000|20110130060218.000|CC1|YOUR MOTHER'S GONE.             
20110130060218.000|20110130060219.000|CC1|>> I GOT ANOTHER CALL FROM MY   
20110130060219.000|20110130060220.000|CC1|SISTER, AND AGAIN SHE WAS       
20110130060220.000|20110130060222.000|CC1|FRANTIC, AND SHE SAID, "MOM'S   
20110130060222.000|20110130060223.000|CC1|DEAD, MOM'S DEAD."              
20110130060223.000|20110130060224.000|CC1|I WAS LIKE, "WHAT?              
20110130060224.000|20110130060225.000|CC1|WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?"    
20110130060225.000|20110130060227.000|CC1|I WAS IN SHOCK.                 
20110130060227.000|20110130060229.000|CC1|I FELT PARALYZED.               
20110130060229.000|20110130060231.000|CC1|IT WAS UNREAL.                  
20110130060231.000|20110130060233.000|CC1|>> WHEN THEY CONDUCTED A SEARCH 
20110130060233.000|20110130060234.000|CC1|WARRANT ON THE HOUSE, THEY BEGAN
20110130060234.000|20110130060236.000|CC1|TO FIND EVIDENCE.               
20110130060236.000|20110130060237.000|CC1|>> WE DID COME UPON A PLACE IN  
20110130060237.000|20110130060238.000|CC1|THE BACK OF THE CLOSET.         
20110130060238.000|20110130060239.000|CC1|THERE WERE SOME OBJECTS THERE   
20110130060239.000|20110130060241.000|CC1|THAT WERE SEPARATE.             
20110130060241.000|20110130060242.000|CC1|THERE WEREN'T SHOES, THERE      
20110130060242.000|20110130060243.000|CC1|WEREN'T CLOTHES.                
20110130060243.000|20110130060244.000|CC1|THERE WERE SOME BAGS AND        
20110130060244.000|20110130060245.000|CC1|CAMERAS.                        
20110130060245.000|20110130060246.000|CC1|>> IT WAS A CRITICAL PIECE OF   
20110130060246.000|20110130060248.000|CC1|EVIDENCE.                       
20110130060248.000|20110130060249.000|CC1|SHE DID, IN FACT, SPEAK FROM THE
20110130060249.000|20110130060253.000|CC1|GRAVE.                          
20110130060253.000|20110130060254.000|CC1|>> "EVERY PICTURE TELLS A

20110130060254.000|20110130060255.000|CC1| STORY," TONIGHT'S 48 HOURS

20110130060502.000|20110130060503.000|CC1|HOME, THERE WASN'T ANY SIGN OF

20110130060507.000|20110130060509.000|CC1|CLOTHING ITEMS HADN'T BEEN

20110130060510.000|20110130060511.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CRIMINAL           
20110130060511.000|20110130060513.000|CC1|INVESTIGATOR JASON FENTNER WAS  
20110130060513.000|20110130060515.000|CC1|ONLY 29 AND HAD JUST STARTED    
20110130060515.000|20110130060517.000|CC1|WORKING HOMICIDES IN COWETA     
20110130060517.000|20110130060518.000|CC1|COUNTY, GEORGIA, NOT FAR FROM   
20110130060518.000|20110130060519.000|CC1|ATLANTA.                        
20110130060519.000|20110130060521.000|CC1|>> MISS McNAUGHTON WAS WEARING  
20110130060521.000|20110130060523.000|CC1|JEWELRY, GOLD AND DIAMOND       
20110130060523.000|20110130060524.000|CC1|JEWELRY ON HER PERSON THAT HAD  
20110130060524.000|20110130060526.000|CC1|NOT BEEN RIPPED OFF OR STOLEN.  
20110130060526.000|20110130060528.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS WAS HIS FIRST 
20110130060528.000|20110130060529.000|CC1|MAJOR MURDER CASE, AND IT WAS A 
20110130060529.000|20110130060532.000|CC1|DOOZY.                          
20110130060532.000|20110130060533.000|CC1|>> IT LOOKED LIKE A HORROR HOUSE
20110130060533.000|20110130060534.000|CC1|THAT YOU MIGHT GO IN ON         
20110130060534.000|20110130060536.000|CC1|HALLOWEEN.                      
20110130060536.000|20110130060537.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CATHY McNAUGHTON   
20110130060537.000|20110130060538.000|CC1|HAD BEEN STABBED MORE THAN 30   
20110130060538.000|20110130060540.000|CC1|TIMES.                          
20110130060540.000|20110130060541.000|CC1|>> WHAT TOOK PLACE, WHAT KIND OF
20110130060541.000|20110130060543.000|CC1|MURDER?                         
20110130060543.000|20110130060544.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT SHE WAS A MOST-
20110130060544.000|20110130060546.000|CC1|UNLIKELY VICTIM.                
20110130060546.000|20110130060547.000|CC1|>> BY ALL ACCOUNTS, MISS        
20110130060547.000|20110130060548.000|CC1|McNAUGHTON WAS A REALLY NICE    
20110130060548.000|20110130060549.000|CC1|PERSON WITH NO ENEMIES.         
20110130060549.000|20110130060553.000|CC1|EVERYBODY LOVED HER.            
20110130060553.000|20110130060554.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS DEFINITELY CHATTY,   
20110130060554.000|20110130060555.000|CC1|VERY CHATTY.                    
20110130060555.000|20110130060557.000|CC1|WE CALLED HER "CHATTY CATHY."   
20110130060557.000|20110130060557.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MICHELLE MENDENHALL
20110130060557.000|20110130060600.000|CC1|IS CATHY'S YOUNGEST DAUGHTER.   
20110130060600.000|20110130060601.000|CC1|>> SHE ALWAYS SAW THE BEST IN   
20110130060601.000|20110130060602.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110130060602.000|20110130060603.000|CC1|ALWAYS GAVE PEOPLE THE BENEFIT  
20110130060603.000|20110130060604.000|CC1|OF THE DOUBT.                   
20110130060604.000|20110130060606.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CATHY HAD RETIRED  
20110130060606.000|20110130060607.000|CC1|AFTER A LONG CAREER AT DELTA    
20110130060607.000|20110130060609.000|CC1|AIRLINES AND WAS IN TRAINING TO 
20110130060609.000|20110130060611.000|CC1|JOIN AN INVESTMENT FIRM.        
20110130060611.000|20110130060612.000|CC1|>> SHE WORKED FROM THE BOTTOM UP
20110130060612.000|20110130060614.000|CC1|AT DELTA WHEN SHE STARTED.      
20110130060614.000|20110130060615.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO YOUR MOTHER WAS 
20110130060615.000|20110130060616.000|CC1|REALLY SORT OF A SELF-MADE      
20110130060616.000|20110130060617.000|CC1|WOMAN.                          
20110130060617.000|20110130060619.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS.                     
20110130060619.000|20110130060621.000|CC1|SHE ALWAYS WAS INDEPENDENT,     
20110130060621.000|20110130060622.000|CC1|FINANCIALLY INDEPENDENT.        
20110130060622.000|20110130060624.000|CC1|SHE USED TO ALWAYS SAY, "DON'T  
20110130060624.000|20110130060624.000|CC1|RELY ON A MAN,," YOU KNOW,      
20110130060624.000|20110130060626.000|CC1|"FINANCIALLY."                  
20110130060626.000|20110130060627.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT EMOTIONALLY,   
20110130060627.000|20110130060628.000|CC1|SHE WAS NOT AS INDEPENDENT AS   
20110130060628.000|20110130060630.000|CC1|SHE WOULD HAVE LIKED.           
20110130060630.000|20110130060632.000|CC1|AFTER NEARLY 21 YEARS OF        
20110130060632.000|20110130060635.000|CC1|MARRIAGE, CATHY GOT A DIVORCE.  
20110130060635.000|20110130060636.000|CC1|>> I DON'T THINK SHE THOUGHT IN 
20110130060636.000|20110130060637.000|CC1|HER MIDDLE AGE SHE'D BE         
20110130060637.000|20110130060639.000|CC1|DIVORCED.                       
20110130060639.000|20110130060640.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HEATHER MENDENHALL 
20110130060640.000|20110130060642.000|CC1|IS CATHY'S OLDEST DAUGHTER.     
20110130060642.000|20110130060643.000|CC1|>> IT'S KIND OF LIKE, "I'M 50   
20110130060643.000|20110130060646.000|CC1|YEARS OLD AND I'M LONELY."      
20110130060646.000|20110130060647.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HER TWO ADULT      
20110130060647.000|20110130060649.000|CC1|DAUGHTERS WERE ON THEIR OWN.    
20110130060649.000|20110130060650.000|CC1|CATHY DATED, BUT THERE WAS NO   
20110130060650.000|20110130060652.000|CC1|ONE SPECIAL.                    
20110130060652.000|20110130060653.000|CC1|>> SHE WANTED TO BE HAPPY AND   
20110130060653.000|20110130060656.000|CC1|GROW OLD WITH SOMEBODY.         
20110130060656.000|20110130060657.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SHE WENT LOOKING   
20110130060657.000|20110130060700.000|CC1|FOR LOVE ONLINE, AND THAT'S     
20110130060700.000|20110130060703.000|CC1|WHERE CATHY MET ALEC McNAUGHTON,
20110130060703.000|20110130060705.000|CC1|A LAWYER FROM ENID, OKLAHOMA.   
20110130060705.000|20110130060706.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS INTELLIGENT.         
20110130060706.000|20110130060707.000|CC1|SHE WAS WELL READ, WELL         
20110130060707.000|20110130060708.000|CC1|TRAVELED.                       
20110130060708.000|20110130060710.000|CC1|WE HAD A LOT OF THOSE THINGS IN 
20110130060710.000|20110130060712.000|CC1|COMMON.                         
20110130060712.000|20110130060713.000|CC1|LOVE IS SOMETHING THAT JUST     
20110130060713.000|20110130060715.000|CC1|HAPPENS.                        
20110130060715.000|20110130060716.000|CC1|THERE'S NOT A WHOLE LOT OF LOGIC
20110130060716.000|20110130060717.000|CC1|TO IT SOMETIMES.                
20110130060717.000|20110130060718.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ALEC McNAUGHTON WAS
20110130060718.000|20110130060720.000|CC1|55.                             
20110130060720.000|20110130060721.000|CC1|HE'D BEEN MARRY THREE TIMES AND 
20110130060721.000|20110130060722.000|CC1|CATHY FELL FOR HIM QUICKLY AND  
20110130060722.000|20110130060726.000|CC1|HARD.                           
20110130060726.000|20110130060728.000|CC1|>> THEY HAD DATED FOR ABOUT     
20110130060728.000|20110130060729.000|CC1|FIVE, SIX MONTHS, AND THEN THEY 
20110130060729.000|20110130060731.000|CC1|WERE ALREADY TALKING ENGAGEMENT.
20110130060731.000|20110130060731.000|CC1|WE DEFINITELY QUESTIONED, LIKE, 
20110130060731.000|20110130060732.000|CC1|"MOM, DON'T YOU THINK THIS IS A 
20110130060732.000|20110130060733.000|CC1|LITTLE TOO FAST?"               
20110130060733.000|20110130060734.000|CC1|AND SHE WOULD JUST BE LIKE,     
20110130060734.000|20110130060736.000|CC1|"HE'S IT.                       
20110130060736.000|20110130060737.000|CC1|HE'S IT.                        
20110130060737.000|20110130060739.000|CC1|HE'S MY SOULMATE."              
20110130060739.000|20110130060740.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THEN ON        
20110130060740.000|20110130060742.000|CC1|NOVEMBER 15, 2004, LESS THAN ONE
20110130060742.000|20110130060743.000|CC1|YEAR AFTER THEY MET, CATHY AND  
20110130060743.000|20110130060748.000|CC1|ALEC BECAME HUSBAND AND WIFE.   
20110130060748.000|20110130060750.000|CC1|>> IT WAS A SMALL WEDDING.      
20110130060750.000|20110130060754.000|CC1|MY MOM WORE A BIG, WHITE DRESS. 
20110130060754.000|20110130060754.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WAS THAT OUT OF    
20110130060754.000|20110130060756.000|CC1|CHARACTER FOR YOUR MOTHER?      
20110130060756.000|20110130060757.000|CC1|DID SHE DO THINGS QUICKLY,      
20110130060757.000|20110130060758.000|CC1|IMPULSIVELY?                    
20110130060758.000|20110130060800.000|CC1|>> NO.                          
20110130060800.000|20110130060801.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SO WHAT DID YOU    
20110130060801.000|20110130060802.000|CC1|MAKE OF THIS?                   
20110130060802.000|20110130060805.000|CC1|>> I THOUGHT THAT SHE WAS HAPPY.
20110130060805.000|20110130060805.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE WERE SOME    
20110130060805.000|20110130060806.000|CC1|PROBLEMS.                       
20110130060806.000|20110130060808.000|CC1|McNAUGHTON TOLD CATHY HE WAS    
20110130060808.000|20110130060809.000|CC1|HAVING TROUBLE GETTING HIS      
20110130060809.000|20110130060811.000|CC1|GEORGIA LAW LICENSE SO HE BECAME
20110130060811.000|20110130060813.000|CC1|A CAR SALESMAN, BUT THEY        
20110130060813.000|20110130060815.000|CC1|MANAGED.                        
20110130060815.000|20110130060816.000|CC1|HOW WAS THE MARRIAGE?           
20110130060816.000|20110130060818.000|CC1|>> VERY GOOD.                   
20110130060818.000|20110130060818.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU WERE HAPPY     
20110130060818.000|20110130060820.000|CC1|TOGETHER?                       
20110130060820.000|20110130060823.000|CC1|>> WE WERE.                     
20110130060823.000|20110130060825.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THE GOOD TIMES 
20110130060825.000|20110130060826.000|CC1|ENDED WHEN McNAUGHTON'S         
20110130060826.000|20110130060829.000|CC1|DAUGHTER, ALEXIS FROM A PREVIOUS
20110130060829.000|20110130060830.000|CC1|MARRIAGE, WAS KILLED IN A CAR   
20110130060830.000|20110130060832.000|CC1|ACCIDENT AT THE AGE OF 22.      
20110130060832.000|20110130060834.000|CC1|>> THIS GIRL WAS A SHOW STOPPER-
20110130060834.000|20110130060836.000|CC1|- COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY, WOMAN'S  
20110130060836.000|20110130060837.000|CC1|STUDIES MAJOR, HAD INTERNS WITH 
20110130060837.000|20110130060839.000|CC1|HILARY CLINTON.                 
20110130060839.000|20110130060841.000|CC1|SHE WAS GOING SOMEWHERE.        
20110130060841.000|20110130060841.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHAT DID THAT DO TO
20110130060841.000|20110130060842.000|CC1|YOU?                            
20110130060842.000|20110130060844.000|CC1|>> IT ALMOST KILLED ME.         
20110130060844.000|20110130060847.000|CC1|I WENT INTO A DEPRESSION.       
20110130060847.000|20110130060847.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DID THAT AFFECT    
20110130060847.000|20110130060848.000|CC1|YOUR MARRIAGE?                  
20110130060848.000|20110130060850.000|CC1|>> YEAH.                        
20110130060850.000|20110130060852.000|CC1|IT AFFECTED ME, AND YOU DON'T   
20110130060852.000|20110130060853.000|CC1|RECOVER FROM SOMETHING LIKE     
20110130060853.000|20110130060854.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110130060854.000|20110130060856.000|CC1|MY WIFE SAVED MY LIFE.          
20110130060856.000|20110130060858.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND WHEN POLICE    
20110130060858.000|20110130060859.000|CC1|QUESTIONED HIM AFTER THE MURDER,
20110130060859.000|20110130060859.000|CC1|McNAUGHTON TOLD THEM HE AND     
20110130060859.000|20110130060900.000|CC1|CATHY WERE STILL VERY MUCH IN   
20110130060900.000|20110130060909.000|CC1|LOVE.                           
20110130060909.000|20110130060910.000|CC1|>> HE TOLD ME THAT HE DIDN'T

20110130060917.000|20110130060918.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE SPENT HOURS 
20110130060918.000|20110130060918.000|CC1|WITH AN EMOTIONAL McNAUGHTON    
20110130060918.000|20110130060928.000|CC1|OVER THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS.   
20110130060928.000|20110130060929.000|CC1|>> IT WAS IMPORTANT TO GO OVER

20110130060930.000|20110130060933.000|CC1|ACTIVITIES SO THAT WE COULD

20110130060938.000|20110130060939.000|CC1|POLICE WHERE HE HAD BEEN THAT

20110130060947.000|20110130060950.000|CC1|HIS MOTHER'S ABOUT AN HOUR AWAY

20110130061906.000|20110130061907.000|CC1|THERE IS ONE PROBLEM WITH THAT  
20110130061907.000|20110130061908.000|CC1|STORY, THOUGH-- THAT CELL PHONE 
20110130061908.000|20110130061910.000|CC1|TOWER RIGHT OVER THERE.         
20110130061910.000|20110130061914.000|CC1|TOWER NUMBER 309.

20110130061915.000|20110130061918.000|CC1|THAT MATTERS, IS THAT CELL PHONE
20110130061918.000|20110130061921.000|CC1|CALL WAS ORIGINATED ON TOWER    
20110130061921.000|20110130061924.000|CC1|309, A TOWER THAT IS LESS THAN  
20110130061924.000|20110130061926.000|CC1|TWO MILES FROM HIS HOUSE, AND   
20110130061926.000|20110130061929.000|CC1|THAT TOWER IS 40 MILES FROM HIS 
20110130061929.000|20110130061931.000|CC1|MOTHER'S HOUSE.                 
20110130061931.000|20110130061932.000|CC1|SO MR. McNAUGHTON IS NOT AT HIS 
20110130061932.000|20110130061934.000|CC1|MOTHER'S HOUSE WHEN HE'S CALLING

20110130062912.000|20110130062914.000|CC1|HAD ACHIEVED, EVERYTHING THAT HE
20110130062914.000|20110130062915.000|CC1|HAD ACQUIRED, HIS               
20110130062915.000|20110130062919.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISHMENTS.                
20110130062919.000|20110130062920.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AT LEAST THAT'S    
20110130062920.000|20110130062922.000|CC1|WHAT HEATHER THOUGHT, BUT IN MAY
20110130062922.000|20110130062924.000|CC1|2006, A YEAR AND A HALF AFTER   
20110130062924.000|20110130062926.000|CC1|CATHY MARRIED ALEC McNAUGHTON,  
20110130062926.000|20110130062928.000|CC1|HEATHER HAD A TERRIFYING PHONE  
20110130062928.000|20110130062929.000|CC1|CALL WITH HER MOTHER THAT BEGAN 
20110130062929.000|20110130062932.000|CC1|WITH A DINNER INVITATION.       
20110130062932.000|20110130062933.000|CC1|>> SHE SAID THAT SHE'D LOVE TO  
20110130062933.000|20110130062936.000|CC1|COME TO DINNER BUT SHE COULDN'T.
20110130062936.000|20110130062937.000|CC1|SHE SOUNDED FUNNY ON THE PHONE, 
20110130062937.000|20110130062939.000|CC1|AND I JUST, YOU KNOW, KEPT      
20110130062939.000|20110130062940.000|CC1|PUSHING HER A LITTLE BIT AND SHE
20110130062940.000|20110130062942.000|CC1|SAID, "I CAN'T."                
20110130062942.000|20110130062945.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SOON CATHY CONFIDED
20110130062945.000|20110130062947.000|CC1|IN HER DAUGHTER AND TOLD HER A  
20110130062947.000|20110130062948.000|CC1|SHOCKING STORY-- THAT HER       
20110130062948.000|20110130062949.000|CC1|HUSBAND, ALEC McNAUGHTON, HAD   
20110130062949.000|20110130062951.000|CC1|BEATEN HER.                     
20110130062951.000|20110130062954.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS ON HER WAY TO WORK,  
20110130062954.000|20110130062955.000|CC1|AND HE HAD VIOLENTLY FOLLOWED   
20110130062955.000|20110130062957.000|CC1|HER OUT TO THE CAR, OPENED THE  
20110130062957.000|20110130062959.000|CC1|CAR DOOR, AND PULLED HER OUT,   
20110130062959.000|20110130063001.000|CC1|AND TOOK HER BY THE HAIR AND WAS
20110130063001.000|20110130063005.000|CC1|LITERALLY, LIKE, DRAGGING HER.  
20110130063005.000|20110130063005.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DRAGGING HER BY HER
20110130063005.000|20110130063006.000|CC1|HAIR?                           
20110130063006.000|20110130063008.000|CC1|>> UH-HUH.                      
20110130063008.000|20110130063015.000|CC1|HE WAS IN A VIOLENT RAGE.       
20110130063015.000|20110130063016.000|CC1|SHE SAID THAT THERE'S NO WAY    
20110130063016.000|20110130063017.000|CC1|THAT SHE COULD, LIKE, BE SEEN IN
20110130063017.000|20110130063021.000|CC1|PUBLIC.                         
20110130063021.000|20110130063023.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT McNAUGHTON SAYS
20110130063023.000|20110130063025.000|CC1|HE AND CATHY HAD ONLY A SMALL   
20110130063025.000|20110130063028.000|CC1|ARGUMENT OVER A CAR.            
20110130063028.000|20110130063029.000|CC1|HE SAYS HE TRIED TO GRAB THE    
20110130063029.000|20110130063031.000|CC1|KEYS FROM CATHY IN THE DRIVEWAY.
20110130063031.000|20110130063034.000|CC1|SHE FELL OFF HER HIGH HEELS.    
20110130063034.000|20110130063035.000|CC1|>> SHE FELL OFF HER HEELS AS WE 
20110130063035.000|20110130063037.000|CC1|WERE STRUGGLING AND SKINNED HER 
20110130063037.000|20110130063039.000|CC1|ELBOW, I THINK, AND HER KNEE AND
20110130063039.000|20110130063040.000|CC1|HER CHIN.                       
20110130063040.000|20110130063040.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SHE FELL OFF HER   
20110130063040.000|20110130063041.000|CC1|HEELS?                          
20110130063041.000|20110130063042.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110130063042.000|20110130063043.000|CC1|SHE STUMBLED AND WE FELL.       
20110130063043.000|20110130063046.000|CC1|SHE GOT SCUFFED UP.             
20110130063046.000|20110130063047.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHAT DID YOU THINK?
20110130063047.000|20110130063049.000|CC1|>> I WAS FRIGHTENED.            
20110130063049.000|20110130063050.000|CC1|I WAS LIKE, "DID YOU CALL THE   
20110130063050.000|20110130063051.000|CC1|POLICE?"

20110130063052.000|20110130063052.000|CC1|CALL THE POLICE AND I AM NOT    
20110130063052.000|20110130063055.000|CC1|GOING TO."

20110130063057.000|20110130063058.000|CC1|STARTED HER OWN INVESTIGATION OF
20110130063058.000|20110130063100.000|CC1|ALEC AND EVEN KEPT A SECRET     
20110130063100.000|20110130063103.000|CC1|FILE, NOTES AND UNDEVELOPED     
20110130063103.000|20110130063105.000|CC1|PHOTOS IN DISPOSABLE CAMERAS.   
20110130063105.000|20110130063106.000|CC1|POLICE FOUND IT ALL HIDDEN      
20110130063106.000|20110130063110.000|CC1|INSIDE HER CLOSET.              
20110130063110.000|20110130063112.000|CC1|>> I TOOK THE THREE DISPOSABLE  
20110130063112.000|20110130063113.000|CC1|CAMERAS TO A LOCAL DEVELOPER

20110130063321.000|20110130063322.000|CC1|>> THE MARRIAGE SHE WAS

20110130063326.000|20110130063327.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND THEN ONE NIGHT,
20110130063327.000|20110130063329.000|CC1|THE COUPLE'S DISAGREEMENTS OVER

20110130063448.000|20110130063450.000|CC1|YEARS EARLIER.                  
20110130063450.000|20110130063451.000|CC1|>> AND MY STOMACH SANK TO MY    
20110130063451.000|20110130063454.000|CC1|TOES.

20110130063456.000|20110130063457.000|CC1|THAT HAVE PASSED, SHE HAS NEVER

20110130063511.000|20110130063512.000|CC1|>> I NEVER ABUSED MY WIFE OR ANY
20110130063512.000|20110130063517.000|CC1|WOMAN EVER.                     
20110130063517.000|20110130063518.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE EVIDENCE

20110130063519.000|20110130063520.000|CC1|UP.

20110130063531.000|20110130063533.000|CC1|THE DAY OF THE MURDER.

20110130063549.000|20110130063549.000|CC1|>> IT IS.                       
20110130063549.000|20110130063550.000|CC1|IT SOUNDS LOOK A CHALLENGE TO   
20110130063550.000|20110130063551.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110130063551.000|20110130063552.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND ON FEBRUARY 27,
20110130063552.000|20110130063555.000|CC1|2009...                         
20110130063555.000|20110130063555.000|CC1|>> STAND UP, TURN AROUND, PUT   
20110130063555.000|20110130063557.000|CC1|YOUR HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK.    
20110130063557.000|20110130063558.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ...ALEC McNAUGHTON 
20110130063558.000|20110130063559.000|CC1|WAS ARRESTED AND CHARGED WITH   
20110130063559.000|20110130063601.000|CC1|MURDER FOR STABBING HIS WIFE    
20110130063601.000|20110130063604.000|CC1|CATHY MORE THAN 30 TIMES.       
20110130063604.000|20110130063605.000|CC1|HE WAS THROWN IN JAIL WITH NO   
20110130063605.000|20110130063608.000|CC1|BAIL.                           
20110130063608.000|20110130063609.000|CC1|>> THEY RAILROADED ME.          
20110130063609.000|20110130063611.000|CC1|THEY PUT THE BLINDERS, OR THAT  
20110130063611.000|20110130063612.000|CC1|NIGHT.                          
20110130063612.000|20110130063613.000|CC1|THAT HOMICIDE DETECTIVE IN HIS  
20110130063613.000|20110130063614.000|CC1|VERY FIRST MURDER CASE WAS      
20110130063614.000|20110130063615.000|CC1|OVERWHELMED.                    
20110130063615.000|20110130063617.000|CC1|HE DIDN'T KNOW WHAT TO DO, AND  
20110130063617.000|20110130063618.000|CC1|HE DECIDED IT WAS ME RIGHT THERE
20110130063618.000|20110130063619.000|CC1|AT THE SCENE AND NEVER          
20110130063619.000|20110130063623.000|CC1|CONSIDERED ANYBODY ELSE.        
20110130063623.000|20110130063625.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND NOW THE        
20110130063625.000|20110130063627.000|CC1|PROSECUTORS HAD ONE VERY BIG    
20110130063627.000|20110130063629.000|CC1|PROBLEM-- THEY STILL HAD NO IDEA
20110130063629.000|20110130063630.000|CC1|WHO TOOK THOSE DAMNING          
20110130063630.000|20110130063632.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPHS.                    
20110130063632.000|20110130063634.000|CC1|AND WITHOUT THAT CRUCIAL        
20110130063634.000|20110130063635.000|CC1|INFORMATION, THE LAW SAYS, THE  
20110130063635.000|20110130063636.000|CC1|PHOTOS COULD NEVER BE SHOWN TO A
20110130063636.000|20110130063638.000|CC1|JURY.                           
20110130063638.000|20110130063639.000|CC1|>> WE HAD TO CONNECT IT TO THE  
20110130063639.000|20110130063641.000|CC1|CRIME.                          
20110130063641.000|20110130063643.000|CC1|WE HAD TO BE ABLE TO SHOW THAT  
20110130063643.000|20110130063644.000|CC1|IT WAS MR. McNAUGHTON WHO HAD   
20110130063644.000|20110130063645.000|CC1|DONE THIS.

20110130065032.000|20110130065032.000|CC1|           SO YOUR BODY

20110130065043.000|20110130065043.000|CC1|  CELEBREX IS PROVEN TO IMPROVE 
20110130065043.000|20110130065046.000|CC1|     DAILY PHYSICAL FUNCTION

20110130065054.000|20110130065056.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,

20110130065350.000|20110130065351.000|CC1|>> YOU WERE NOT IN SANDY SPRINGS
20110130065351.000|20110130065354.000|CC1|AT 2:33 P.M. ON FEBRUARY 15,    
20110130065354.000|20110130065358.000|CC1|2009.                           
20110130065358.000|20110130065401.000|CC1|ISN'T THAT TRUE?                
20110130065401.000|20110130065403.000|CC1|>> IT'S NOT TRUE.               
20110130065403.000|20110130065403.000|CC1|I WAS.                          
20110130065403.000|20110130065404.000|CC1|I WAS AT MY MOTHER'S.           
20110130065404.000|20110130065404.000|CC1|>> SO THOSE RECORDS ARE WRONG?  
20110130065404.000|20110130065406.000|CC1|>> THEY ARE.                    
20110130065406.000|20110130065407.000|CC1|>> THAT PHONE CALL WAS          
20110130065407.000|20110130065408.000|CC1|ABSOLUTELY CRITICAL TO THIS CASE
20110130065408.000|20110130065411.000|CC1|FROM THE VERY BEGINNING, AND IT 
20110130065411.000|20110130065412.000|CC1|WAS MR. McNAUGHTON'S FATAL

20110130065413.000|20110130065415.000|CC1|>> Reporter: McNAUGHTON TALKED  
20110130065415.000|20110130065416.000|CC1|TO POLICE EARLY IN THE          
20110130065416.000|20110130065419.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION.

20110130065626.000|20110130065626.000|CC1|VICTIM HAS SPOKEN FROM THE DEAD.
20110130065626.000|20110130065627.000|CC1|SHE RECORDED WHAT HAS HAPPENED
